short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reformats Twitch chat messages that include links to strawpoll.me.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has 2 primary functions: 

First, it replaces the links to Strawpoll in the chat from, for example, "http://strawpoll.me/1234567" to a customizable, easily-readable link, such as "Strawpoll 1234567: Do you like the New Group Qualifying?"

Second, it replaces all links from the screamer website "Strawpoii" to their respective Strawpoll.me URLs.

Email me at popcorncolonel@gmail.com for bug reports, suggestions, complaints, etc.

Version 1.1: Initial release!
Version 1.11: Fixed a bug where it would treat "http://strawpoll.me/10http://strawpoll.me/10" as a valid Strawpoll link.

P.S. An option I am considering adding is to vote for a Strawpoll via chat with a command like "/vote <strawpoll_id> <option>". Would that be useful?

https://github.com/popcorncolonel/Chrome-Extensions/tree/master/Twitch%20Chat%20Strawpoll%20Helper
